CustomField.description: If UA only opportunity, enter the same estimated value as in the UA only field For North America, enter contracted value when closing opportunity If flowing UCS data, Qualification Report 12ME JV Sales; otherwise appropriate source for your region
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter estimated amount in line with your 'Opportunity Values Reflect' selection. If UA only, enter the same estimated value as the UA Only field. For North America, enter contracted value when closing opportunity
CustomField.label: Est. Sales/Revenue (UA + JV)
